cast.name: 奥列西亚·弗拉索娃 Olesya Vlasova
蒂莫菲·德米特连科 Timofey Dmitrienko

introduction: Kolya is 8 years old. He lives in a troubled family: exhausted by his daily routine, his mother abuses alcohol and is prone to nervous breakdowns; stepfather allows himself domestic violence. In addition to Kolya's family, he has a friend, Misha, and their common hiding place - a field where you can hang out and lie in the fragrant grass, dream of another life and make wishes while planes land nearby. Kolya's main dream is that his mother would stop drinking.
